participant_1.name: Orhun
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and slightly sarcastic, enjoys fun experiences with friends.
participant_1.background: I'm not a good swimmer at all. I am a vegan and I love hummus. Hello, I just moved here from Germany. I love rollercoasters and sky diving. I do like watching cooking shows.

participant_2.name: Dr. Taylor
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, with a passion for animals and adventure.
participant_2.background: I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. They are constantly on my back. I work; I have a part-time job at Burger King. I just want to have fun with my friends. I do not drink or do drugs or anything.
